languages.text: "Ожидаем вашего взошествия на капитанский трон, Лорд-капитан. Да хранит нас {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}".
"Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."
languages.original_text: "Ожидаем вашего взошествия на капитанский трон, Лорд-капитан. Да хранит нас {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."
"Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."
"Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."
"Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."

languages.text: “我们等你登上舰长的宝座，舰长大人。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑我们。”
languages.original_text: "Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."

traits.locale_text: “我们等你登上舰长的宝座，舰长大人。愿{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}保佑我们。”

languages.text: 「陛下がキャプテンの座へ就かれるのを待っています、ロード・キャプテン。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の加護があらんことを」
languages.original_text: "Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."

traits.locale_text: 「キャプテンの座へ就くのを待っております、ロード・キャプテン。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の加護があらんことを」
「陛下がキャプテンの座へ就かれるのを待っています、ロード・キャプテン。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の加護があらんことを」

languages.text: "Wir warten nur darauf, dass Ihr den Thron des Captains besteigt, Lord Captain. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} beschütze uns."
languages.original_text: "Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."

traits.locale_text: "Wir warten nur darauf, dass Ihr den Thron des Captains besteigt, Lord Captain. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} beschütze uns."

languages.text: « Nous attendons que vous preniez place sur le trône {mf|du capitaine|de la capitaine}, Votre Seigneurie. Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} nous protège. »
languages.original_text: "Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."

traits.locale_text: « Nous attendons que vous preniez place sur le trône {mf|du capitaine|de la capitaine}, Votre Seigneurie. Que l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} nous protège. »

languages.text: «Esperando a que ascienda al trono del capitán, Lord Capitán. Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} nos proteja».
languages.original_text: "Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."

traits.locale_text: «Esperando a que ascienda al trono del capitán, Lord Capitán. Que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} nos proteja».

languages.text: "Kaptan tahtına çıkmanızı bekliyoruz Lord Kaptan. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} bizi korusun."
languages.original_text: "Waiting for you to ascend the captain's throne, Lord Captain. May the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} protect us."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptan tahtına çıkmanız bekleniyor Lord Kaptan. {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} bizi korusun."
